metadata.title: CVE-2024-22914 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-use-after-free was found in SWFTools v0.9.2, in the function inputat lex.swf5.c:2620. It allows an attacker to cause denial of service.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
